title: Justin Timberlake - Cry Me A River [Kaleidoscope Orchestra Remix]

lastfm.summary: "Cry Me a River" is the second single from Justin Timberlake's solo debut album Justified. Released on December 17, 2002, the single, which features guest vocals and production by Timbaland & Scott Storch, won Timberlake a Grammy Award for "Best Male Pop Vocal Performance" in 2004. The song title comes from Cry Me a River written in 1953 by Arthur Hamilton and sung by Julie London in the cult Jayne Mansfield movie "The Girl Can't Help It". According to the Cry Me a River Songfacts, Timberlake wrote this song about Britney Spears . Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Cry Me a River
